mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COLLECTIBLE_POINT (collectible_Type_Name, collectible_Point_Name, member_Id, collected_Point, collectible_Max_Point, collectible_Icon_Link) VALUES (#{collectibleTypeName}, #{collectiblePointName}, #{memberId}, #{collectedPoint}, #{collectibleMaxPoint}, #{collectibleIconLink})
mapper.select: SELECT collectible_Type_Name, collectible_Icon_Link, SUM(collected_Point) AS total_Collected_Type_Point, SUM(collectible_Max_Point) AS total_Collectible_Type_Point FROM COLLECTIBLE_POINT WHERE member_ID = #{memberId} GROUP BY member_ID, collectible_Type_Name, collectible_Icon_Link

SELECT cp.collectible_Type_Name, cp.member_Id, cp.collectible_Icon_Link, cpd.collectible_Point_Name, cpd.collected_Point, cpd.collectible_Max_Point FROM collectible_point cp LEFT JOIN collectible_point_detail cpd ON cp.member_Id = cpd.member_Id WHERE cp.nickname = #{nickname}
